Sentencas: A hybrid plant producing combined heat and power (CHP) from biomass by use of a two-stage gasification concept, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and a micro gas turbine was considered for optimization.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The hybrid plant represents a sustainable and efficient alternative to conventional decentralized CHP plants.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: A clean product gas was produced by the demonstrated two-stage gasifier, thus only simple gas conditioning was necessary prior to the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The plant was investigated by thermodynamic modeling combining zero-dimensional component models into complete system-level models.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses were applied.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Focus in this optimization study was heat management, and the optimization efforts resulted in a substantial gain of approximately 6% in the electrical efficiency of the plant.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The optimized hybrid plant produced approximately 290 kW(e) at an electrical efficiency of 58.2% based on lower heating value (LHV).
Titulo: Exergy analysis and optimization of a biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid system
